message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It is worth $10000 to you and we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering it to you for $9500. This is a special offer considering its high value and the benefits it provides. We hope you find this proposal favorable.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. However, we need to maintain our pricing strategy to ensure sustainability and continue providing high-quality products to our customers. We are willing to negotiate further, so we propose an offer of $8600 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget with your latest offer. I'd be willing to pay $8000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and my budget constraints.
